param_input_item.param_description: a function handle to execute upon cleanup.

param_output_item.param_description: an onCleanup object that executes the specified function handle upon cleanup.

description.p: onCleanup creates an object that executes a specified function handle when the object is cleared or goes out of scope, allowing for cleanup tasks to be performed automatically upon function completion.
cancel(obj) or obj.cancel() prevents the cleanup function from being executed.

example_item.example_item_data: a = onCleanup(@() disp('Cleanup executed')) clear a
